comments.body:
@soltysh -- how about this note?

I couldn't think of convincing scenarios where translations to released Kubernetes versions will be updated, but still felt to keep the block and add the note.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +46,50 @@> the translations are now embedded into the binary at compile time.
> See: https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/99829

With the `mo` files up to date, you can now convert the generated files
into code using `go-bindata` command which can be installed with:

comments.body: does the moved `extract.py` script still work in its new location?
Good point. I didn't verify that. Will check the same.

Checked. It does work. The script takes in a file path as an argument. Changing the location of the script itself doesn't change its working.

The documentation just needs to reflect the latest location.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +49,53 @@With the `mo` files up to date, you can now convert the generated files
into code using `go-bindata` command which can be installed with:

```console
go get github.com/go-bindata/go-bindata/...
